subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Door To The Dead

I'm just hanging out working. Back in the reserves and still doing the TPI =
thing and now another group 6th Sense Paranormal. Thats a great bunch of fo=
lks in that one.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Golden Phoenix 
 =
 To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, February 14, 2009 2:28 PM
 =
 Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Door To The Dead


        not to bad for an old ma=
n here. not much happening around here but home repairs.

        http://ww=
w.myspace.com/ghost_hunter50 see my site links

        --- On Sat, 2/14/09=
, Larry Weinreich <LWEINREICH@...> wrote:


          From: Larry W=
einreich <LWEINREICH@...>
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Door To =
The Dead
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Saturday, Fe=
bruary 14, 2009, 2:10 PM


          Hey Jeff!!!!
            Nice to see y=
a again :) Hows it going down there? Elly and the others from across the po=
nd send their wish's :) You me...I always say what I feel.
                =
        Larry

            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: =
Golden Phoenix 
            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
            Sent:=
 Saturday, February 14, 2009 1:53 PM
            Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Doo=
r To The Dead


                  Dang  Larry tell us how Ya really feel ol=
d buddy LOL.

                  http://www.myspace. com/ghost_ hunter50 see=
 my site links

                  --- On Sat, 2/14/09, laurie@steuber. com =
<laurie@steuber. com> wrote:


                    From: laurie@steuber. co=
m <laurie@steuber. com>
                    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Door To =
The Dead
                    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                 =
   Date: Saturday, February 14, 2009, 12:42 PM


                    I agre=
e, Larry! (and I am a psychic, lol)
                    I did not watch the=
 show because my group and I were actually out investigating  something las=
t night. As it is we are very busy with cases, box research and other resea=
rch and projects. We do not, therefore, have time to watch other people,oft=
en pathetic wanna-be famous para-celebs, pretend to be what we really are.
=

                    I wrote a blog about this whole thing - in this field,=
 thos that can do..those that can't sit and watch others pretend to do ti o=
n TV.

                    Laurie
                    -----Original Message=
-----
                    From: "Larry Weinreich" <LWEINREICH@satx. rr.com>=

                    Sent: Saturday, February 14, 2009 1:35pm
             =
       To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                    Subject: Re: [EVP-I=
TC] Door To The Dead


                    I find most paranormal shows hav=
e become BS and I don't watch any. Its all the same "dog and pony" act. Sin=
ce "Ghost Hunters" has become a hit "everyone" wants their own tv show or r=
adio show. Its all "look at me".
                                     Sorry=
 I'm very jaded on tv paranormal investigators, mediums and evangelists on =
Sunday mornings. In my book they all rank just a bit above lawyers but stil=
l below pro wrestling.
                      (Hows that for an introduction=
?  :)  )
                                      Larry

                     =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: John S 
        =
              To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
                      Sent: Sat=
urday, February 14, 2009 9:44 AM
                      Subject: [EVP-ITC] D=
oor To The Dead


                      I have to admit that I thought I ha=
d seen the worst 'paranormal' show on television already. I was wrong. Door=
 to the Dead has exceeded my worst expectations.

                      Gen=
erally, I respect John Oliver's work as a medium. While I have no personal =
experience with him, in the past he has looked and acted more genuine than =
not, the rolling of the eyes put aside for the moment.

                   =
   I do take exception to the characterization of the talking box as an Edi=
son device. I have documented the history of Edison, ITC and EVP  elsewhere=
. This is however the smallest concern I have with this show.

            =
          Prior to wathcing I had just had a conversation with a respected =
colleague on the West coast regarding interesting phenomena he and others a=
re constantly observing in sites with phenomena similar to that on Door to =
the Dead. None of those measurements were made by this team. The use of the=
rmal in this situation is not indicated as well.

                      The=
 real concern is that no attempt was made to help this family in a broader =
context. The skeptic did and said nothing skeptical as far as I could tell.=
 Key questions were not asked (at least on-camera) that would reveal the ps=
ycho-dynamics of this family. We know fairly well at this time that PK phen=
omena is often centered on a focal person who can exhibit specific characte=
ristics. That the team seems unaware of this is quite disturbing to a perso=
n like myself.

                      A real research opportunity was lost =
in this case, as was an opportunity to educate the public on the right way =
to approach such situations. Continually sending the messages that phenomen=
a is based on 'demons' and 'spirits' exclusively does nothing to further th=
e position of serious investigators, which is perhaps most troubling of all=
.
